con:config.script: String date = new Date() date = date.replaceAll(":","_") date = date.replaceAll(" ","_") Email_ID = "\"" + "Sanity_Group_" + date + "\"" Email_ID = Email_ID.toUpperCase() Email_ID_string = "Sanity_Group_" + date Email_ID_string = Email_ID_string.toUpperCase() testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Group_Name", Email_ID) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Group_Name_string", Email_ID_string)
